summary: A second-class horror movie has to be shown at Cannes Film Festival, but, before each screening, the projectionist is killed by a mysterious fellow, with hammer and sickle, just as it happens in the film to be shown.
cast: Chantal Lauby|Alain Chabat|Dominique Farrugia|Gérard Darmon|Sam Karmann|Patrick Lizana|Jean-Christophe Bouvet|Eric Prat|Marc de Jonge|Valérie Lemercier|Tchéky Karyo|Jean-Pierre Bacri|Daniel Gélin|Eddy Mitchell|Hélène de Fougerolles|Christophe Luthringer|Florence Joubert|Guillaume de Montlivault|Lionel Gagniart|Stefan Von Frustergen|Dominique Besnehard|Hélène Rodier|Géraldine Bonnet-Guérin|Bô Geste|Dave|Valérie Hamard|Anne-Marie Cardonna|Benoit De Lorme|Nicolas Sommermeyer|Alain Clément|Nicolas Giraudi|Sabine Colin|Debbie Perron|Bo Salem|Emmanuelle Chardin|Patrice Laffont|Henri de Turenne|Mickael Goux|Zoon Besse|Artus de Penguern|Pierre Amzallag|Bruno Carette|Sophie Mounicot|Claire Hammond|Florence Viala|Christine Burlett|Ramon Sampertegui|Juana Campos|Pascaline Petit|Alain Vetillard|Emmanuelle Menard|Esméralda Petit|Jean-Pierre Thorn|Frédérick Wells|Claudia Hickel|Maurice Cronier|Jan Robert Tellegen|Christian Moro|Pierre Val|Alexis Desseaux|Michèle Comba|Laurent Yves Giloux|Anne Killian|Pierre Lescure|Daniel Toscan du Plantier|Pierre Héros|Rosanna Arquette|Rony Abitbol|Jean-Pierre Lacot|Fédélé Papalia|Nicolas Abraham|Maurice Chabat|Paul Farrugia|Patrick Steltzer|Jean-Philippe Charmard|Anne Lévy|Olivier Doran|Franck Milhan|Philippe Vanneste|Bruno Argence|Philippe Chany|Michel Hazanavicius|Emmanuelle Le Coze|Christian Gazio|Jennifer Ayache|Eric Nguyen|Victoria Obermayer|Georges Carlo

title: Cannes, ciudad del miedo
